```{.r .cell-code}
# renomeando colunas
credito <- credito %>% 
                rename( inadimplente = default, estudante = student, balanco = balance,
                receita = income)
credito <- credito %>% mutate( inadimplente =  case_when(
                           inadimplente == "No"  ~ "Nao",
                           inadimplente == "Yes" ~ "Sim"
                          )) %>% mutate(inadimplente = factor(inadimplente))
credito <- credito %>% mutate( estudante =  case_when(
                           estudante == "No"  ~ 0,
                           estudante == "Yes" ~ 1
                          )) 

str(credito)
```

```{.r .cell-code}
vars <- c("balanco","receita","estudante")
planotrat <- designTreatmentsZ(x_conj_treino, vars, verbose=FALSE)
novasvars <- planotrat$scoreFrame %>%

## Treinando


::: {.cell}

## 1a tentativa Xgboost
library(xgboost)
```

```

```

```{.r .cell-code}
num_class = 2
params = list(
  booster="gbtree",
  eta=0.001,
  max_depth=5,
  gamma=3,
  subsample=0.75,
  colsample_bytree=1,
  objective="multi:softprob",
  eval_metric="mlogloss",
  num_class=num_class
)

set.seed(21)
cv <- xgb.cv(data = as.matrix(conj_treino.trat), label = as.matrix(y_treino), params=params, 
             nrounds = 10000, nfold = 5, early_stopping_rounds=10, 
             nthreads=1, verbose=FALSE)
# cv
elog <- as.data.frame(cv$evaluation_log)
elog %>% 
   summarize(ntrees.train = which.min(train_mlogloss_mean),  
             ntrees.test  = which.min(test_mlogloss_mean))   
```

## Modelo Final


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
modelo_xgb <- xgboost(data = as.matrix(conj_treino.trat), label = as.matrix(y_treino),
             params=params, nrounds = nrounds, verbose = FALSE)
```
:::


## Previsões


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
conj_teste.trat$prev <- predict(modelo_xgb, as.matrix(conj_teste.trat), reshape=T)
```
:::


## Avaliando

xgb.ychapeu <- as.factor(ifelse(conj_teste.trat$prev[,1] > 0.5,0,1))
confusionMatrix(xgb.ychapeu,as.factor(y_teste), positive="1")
